name: Miami
description: Premier licensed electricians serving the City of Miami, Florida. Solomon Electric provides 24/7 professional electrical services for Miami's diverse neighborhoods, from high-rise condos in Brickell to historic homes in Coconut Grove.

challenges.title: High-Rise Electrical Systems
challenges.description: Miami's skyline requires specialized knowledge of high-voltage distribution, conduit systems, and fire safety codes for multi-story residential and commercial buildings.

challenges.title: Coastal Corrosion & Humidity
challenges.description: Miami's proximity to the Atlantic means salt air and high humidity constantly threaten electrical connections. We use high-grade materials to prevent premature failure.

challenges.title: Historic District Preservation
challenges.description: Neighborhoods like Coconut Grove and Shenandoah feature historic homes with delicate architecture and antiquated wiring that require expert, non-invasive retrofitting.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Miami?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Miami including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Miami neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Miami?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Miami-Dade County permits for electrical work in Miami, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Miami home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Miami homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Miami.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Miami?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Miami neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you provide electrical services for condos in Brickell and Edgewater?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are experts in condo electrical work. We understand the specific rules of Miami's high-rise buildings, including working with building management, meeting insurance requirements, and navigating vertical electrical systems.

faqs.question: Are your electricians available for emergency calls in Wynwood and Little Havana?
faqs.answer: We offer true 24/7 emergency service throughout the entire City of Miami. Whether it's a commercial power outage in Wynwood or a residential sparking outlet in Little Havana, our technicians respond immediately.

seoContent.heading: Miami's Premier Licensed Electricians
seoContent.body: Miami—The Magic City—is a global hub of culture, business, and innovation. From the glittering towers of Brickell to the lush canopy of Coconut Grove, Miami's electrical needs are as diverse as its people. Solomon Electric is proud to be a trusted provider for Miami's homeowners and entrepreneurs, delivering the professional expertise needed in a world-class city.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Miami's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Miami homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Miami-Dade County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Miami's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Miami Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Miami. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Professional Electrical Solutions for Every Miami Neighborhood
seoContent.body: Whether you're modernizing a boutique in the Design District, upgrading a luxury condo in Edgewater, or restoring the safe power of a family home in Coral Way, Solomon Electric brings 15 years of experience to every project. We understand Miami's strict building codes and unique environmental challenges, ensuring your electrical system is safe, efficient, and ready for the future.
